newsitem.title: FRANCE: Fr Tel says to issue bonds in Ffr next week.
newsitem.headline: Fr Tel says to issue bonds in Ffr next week.

text.p: France Telecom plans to issue long-dated French franc domestic bonds at the beginning of next week although the size and the exact maturity have yet to be fixed, a France Telecom spokeswoman said on Friday.

A syndication manager said given the good level of demand at the 10-year part of the curve, as demonstrated by the success of this week's government bond auction, France Telecom could have an interest in tapping its four billion franc 5.75 percent 2007 bond, first issued in January.
